title: Code Examples
subtitle: Explore Cardity smart protocol examples including Hello World, DRC-20 tokens, wallets, voting systems, and more. Learn from real-world code samples.

hero.title: Code Examples
hero.subtitle: Explore real-world smart protocol examples and learn Cardity programming patterns
hero.description: From simple Hello World to complex DRC-20 tokens, discover how to build powerful smart protocols

pageSubtitle: Learn Cardity through practical examples, from basic contracts to advanced DRC-20 tokens and governance systems

helloWorld.title: Hello World
helloWorld.description: A simple protocol that demonstrates basic Cardity syntax and structure

counter.title: Counter Protocol
counter.description: A simple counter that can be incremented and decremented

drc20Token.title: DRC-20 Token
drc20Token.description: A complete DRC-20 token implementation with mint and transfer functionality

simpleWallet.title: Simple Wallet
simpleWallet.description: A basic wallet protocol for managing Dogecoin balances

votingSystem.title: Voting System
votingSystem.description: A decentralized voting system with proposal creation and voting

eventSystemDemo.title: Event System Demo
eventSystemDemo.description: Demonstrates advanced event handling and state management

contribute.title: Want to contribute examples?
contribute.description: We welcome community contributions of high-quality example code. Your examples can help other developers better understand and use Cardity.

comingSoon.title: Examples Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We are preparing the latest Cardity code examples, stay tuned!
